timeline.message:
New SPONSORSHIP role

* We needed to able in the policies to be able distinguish sponsorhips
of the principal. Therefore, a new role SPONSORSHIP is added.
* The new role SPONSORSHIP is not saved in DB, but is resolved
from the members_sponsored table.
* Now, in the refreshAuthz method, are also added records to principal
roles for this role. For each sponship of the principal there is
information about who is he sponsoring.

timeline.bodyText: Please use method authorizedToManageRole. This one should be deprecated. Or even better and simpler would be to call the method setRole from AuthzResolver right away. It will throw PrivilegeException if the given principal cannot manage the role in the Vo.
timeline.author: balcirakpeter

replies.bodyText: I have changed it to the authorizedToManageRole method. I don't want to use the AuthzResolver.setRole, since it throws a large amount of unreasonable exception. Also, I don't what to call a higher level component from the bl layer.
replies.author: Vojtech-Sassmann
